Reviews.Title: Straight Talk
Reviews.Author: Danny Hussey
Reviews.Content: I read several reviews on this thing. They didn't do it justice. I paid 98.99 for mine, the price went up since. Still worth it. Sure the picture is not HD, but you can recognize faces, just aim it at doorways and driveways, not across the backyard. The night vision is not bad either. People were gripping about that too, just don't aim them across the neighborhood they work FINE. They also gripped about the color. Yeah green is kinna purple, but you know what color trees are, it's not important. THIS PRODUCT IS WELL WORTH 100 - 150.00 The setup is easy, ran the wires under the house to outside, the iPhone setup was super easy. Added the harddrive, EASY. It's a good product, you just can't be an idiot.

Reviews.Title: best buy of the year for me
Reviews.Author: countrytechboy
Reviews.Content: I am thoroughly satisfied with this product.  It just doesn't get any better than this system right here.  To all the people who whined about the quality of the camera resolution, get real, these cameras are $50-$60 equivalent cameras sold in this package for around $11 so if you really need hd on your security cams, pay the extra for hd cams!  The DVR has all the features you can fathom including pan/tilt (for cams equipped with such), motion detection record w/scheduled rec and you can even reject motion on certain areas of the view, there are lockout settings to allow different users access to different cams and settings, there is local and internet remote control or view (again depending on user presets),  customer service is good, directions aren't bad.  If I could give it 6 stars I would.  Buy it if you have use for it and if you have a little bit of tech background to install it.  Everything's made in China but if you can find me one made in the USA that does the same ill happily pay double.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money, works well, you need to buy a hard drive
Reviews.Author: E. A. Bustos "Techie"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this from Woot about six months ago at around a hundred dollars, which I thought was a great price since at the time I had seen it for twice as much.  I had it sitting around in the original box for a few months, trying to find someone to install it.  I finally found someone to install it for me, and luckily I opened the box the day before he came to start setting it up.One thing I noticed from reading the description on Woot and this description is that I could not find mention that this does NOT come with a hard drive.  Since it touts the fact that it records I assumed it would come with at least a little something it would record onto, but to my surprise it didn't.  So much for being so cheap, but I would have liked to know ahead of time that I had to buy a separate device since it seemed to include everything.  When I bought my TiVo it's billed as a DVR - digital video recorder - and the recorder is part of the name so the recording device is included.  Personally, I don't think it should say DVR since it doesn't become one until you actually buy the hard drive.  Anyway, my neighborhood has been somewhat sinking in quality and a friend who lives not too far away had her home broken into while she was home with her family  so I decided that safe is better than sorry and splurged for a 2TB WD hard drive (that's the largest the DVR will accept, and make sure you buy an AV-GP rated drive so that it lasts longer; the manual specifically states not to use a regular computer hard drive).  So that added about another hundred bucks to this purchase, plus the installation for me was another hundred bucks but I don't mind the money since I now have peace of mind.The manual that comes with it is not organized very well, and I've actually misplaced it, but the zmodo website has all the information you need.  They have the manual online, which now that I'm switching to a paperless office I prefer to just have the manuals on my computer as PDFs and then access them when I need them.  When you install the HDD, you have to go to the menu and format it first, it will beep at you for a while when you first turn it on after installing it.  Actually, any time you turn the machine off and then back on it beeps at you.  And you don't realize it's formatting; I saw that it was starting to format then the screen disappeared and I couldn't access anything on the menu until about fifteen minutes later.  I assume that it was formatting during that time since I bought a behemoth of a hard drive so I just left it on it's own and when I came back I was able to get into the menu.I'm still having trouble accessing the DVR from my computer and from the app, but that's just related to my getting all the network settings and IP addresses and whatnot that my computer is giving me trouble with.  Overall it's really very good; yes, the colors are off but I can recognize people and I have the peace of mind that people can see the cameras and hopefully will move on to another house if they have nefarious purposes.  They seem to hold up well with the weather, and are quite sensitive with motion detection because the other day it snowed and the motion detector was constantly on.  Once I am able to access the device remotely I feel I'll be good; I have the Zviewer app on my iPhone, I just need those settings.  There are also many YouTube videos that help you with getting the settings and setting the system up.  I took off one star because of the lack of mentioning the DVR has no "R" included, but that shouldn't deter you from this device.  Better safe than sorry.UPDATE: Zmodo technical support is awesome!  I had about a twenty minute wait for a technician, but it was worth it.  The technician connected to my computer, also had issues connecting to my DVR from the computer (that actually made me feel good because I'm a tech person and it was really bugging me that I couldn't do it myself, there was apparently something else going on because the tech had quite a time with the software, which ultimately didn't install) but was able to finally connect using Internet Explorer.  NOTE: If you're using IE 64 bit, you won't be able to connect, it will keep asking you to install Active X then not work.  You have to connect with IE (and yes, sadly only IE) 32 bit.  The tech then went to configure access so that I can view the cameras on my iPhone remotely, but wasn't able to because of my modem.  He explained exactly what I had to tell Time Warner Cable to do to my cable modem, and also mentioned that I should request at least a tier 2 support person.  He even left a detailed note in notepad for me to reference when calling TWC.  I've never experienced such extensive support from a company before, AND I didn't even have to pay for that support!  I then contacted Time Warner Cable (via Twitter, calling on the phone is pretty useless) and a tier 3 support person actually called me back.  If you have TWC you most likely won't be able to have the open the required ports, but they will bridge the modem to your router and since the tech had previously connected the ports to my router, in a snap I was set up and viewing my cameras remotely.  A really great product and with such amazing technical support why go anywhere else.  I added back a star due their great support.

Reviews.Title: Easy and quick
Reviews.Author: Paul L. Wheeler "Bug Catcher"
Reviews.Content: I was concerned about my hard drive not being compatible, but the company made it really simple. Cameras are OK, but grainy with only their illumination, but easily overcome with a small light in the area.

Reviews.Title: Work great
Reviews.Author: Becky Chafe
Reviews.Content: Great picture, easy to set up.  Just make sure you run the wire in the right direction.  We ran all four wires through the attic and then discovered the ends of the wires were different.  We had every wire backwards..

Reviews.Title: Zmodo 8ch H.264 Security Camera System
Reviews.Author: Salem Or
Reviews.Content: Decent system for the price. However, the camera mounts are extremely limited in your mounting options. The mounts in my opinion limit you to only a couple camera angle options, and in some installations I could see the mount having to be replaced with one that would allow you to mount the camera properly. Also ZMODO, why would you not at least include one or two Video Surveillance warning signs or decals in the box? That way when you have it installed you can be ready to go legally. Not having to order in or go purchase a sign off the get go, I can understand not sending a dozen signs in the box, but at least one or two would be of some help. The quick setup instructions are lacking, but if you have a day to kill and want to read the included complete owners and setup manual you have that option available to you as well. It's okay for the price, and with the camera's and warning signs in place hopefully it is more of a deterrent than a system I will have to call upon if needed.

Reviews.Title: ZMODO Security Cameras
Reviews.Author: Steven M. Petr "Steve's Woodworking  Room"
Reviews.Content: The cameras were easy to connect, but getting the wires from the outside of the house to the cameras itself was some work. I had to run some of the camera cables through the attic so make sure you do a good estimate on how long you need your cables.  The kit I had came with 50ft long cables.  I had to order the 100 ft cables.  Also, I thought that four cameras would be sufficient and I was wrong. Eight cameras is what I needed.  Also I got the white to match the white trim on my house.  If you have any problems theres a ton of stuff on U-tube to help.

Reviews.Title: Great picture great value!
Reviews.Author: JeepGuyFL
Reviews.Content: This item is a no brainier if looking for an entry level system and actually the cams produce a very high quality image both day and especially night. The 65ft ir range is actually an accurate estimate wherein I have never seen any actually view over 15ft in total dark, including cams costing $85 alone, with any quality and boy this one is bright, like an invisible flood light.Love it and will be buying another one asap, can never have enough cams... lol ;-)

Reviews.Title: Broke after 3 days.
Reviews.Author: Ozz
Reviews.Content: The system works well enough....when it's working. After 3 days the Infra Red stopped working on 1 camera. I called the seller's "customer service"....Only to be told to call the manufacturer. I then called the manufacturer and stayed on hold for almost 3 HOURS, (they only have ONE person in tech support.) So I called the seller back and they told me I could only return the WHOLE UNIT. Well... I had already taken 9 hours to install it the right way. They did not care. It would be very easy to pull the defective camera and send that in for replacement...but nope. Not allowed. My only option is to remove all the cameras (That took 9 hours to install.), remove my hard drive, repackage and ship back. In my mind they do this to discourage defective returns. Like I said, it works OK when it's working but if you get a defective one...You're outta luck. No one will help you. Kiss you're money goodbye!UPDATE: Just got off the phone with Zmodo. They say they are sending a replacement camera. I'll let you know if it ever gets here.

Reviews.Title: Caught theif 3 times
Reviews.Author: kyle
Reviews.Content: After money missing from my car I decided to set up a system to see who it was. I thought it was a one time thing until, i reviewed the tapes from one week and saw a man on 3 seperate occasions enter my property. I used this video to give to my sheriffs office. The set up was easy although the remote viewing is tricky. Zmodo's knowledge bank online was helpful in this set up. I gave it four stars because the ir length is not amazing but it still gets the job done. You have one happy customer and one behind bars.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: The best $190 I have ever spent.  Very satisfied, I had it up and running for about a week now. No problems. I would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: works good so far
Reviews.Author: GSC
Reviews.Content: I am editing my original review to reflect my opinion after a few weeks of use. The system seems to work as well as I would expect for the price I paid. My original review spoke of the cable length not being 60' as advertised. I installed the forth camera today and took the opportunity to measure the cable before the installation. The cable measured out at 56.5'. While this is short of the advertised 60' it's not that big of a deal. I changed my 4 star rating to 5. I have had some vandalism taking place in the alley behind my business. I placed the cameras in locations to keep an eye on my back door, but high enough to be out of the line of sight. The small camera size makes them very inconspicuous. I used an old computer monitor to help with the setup. After going though the online network setup that Zmodo has on their website, I did have to call Zmodo tech to help me with the final tweaks to be able to monitor the system from my computer and smart phone. I had about a 30 minute wait on hold until the tech answered. He was very helpful and easy to understand, unlike some help lines. I can now view the cameras from any of my computers, and my android phone, either on my business network, home network, or the 4G network.As I expected, the image quality isn't like that of more expensive cameras. I can make out faces pretty well up to about 25 feet daytime, and about 15 feet at night. The night vision is better that thought it would be, and the daytime isn't as good as I had hoped. But since I'm only having trouble at night, it should work out just fine. Fortunately, I haven't had any vandals since the cameras have been in place. I have discovered that my IP address on my wireless router changes sometimes, I have been told that this is because I have a dynamic IP address. You will have to change your remote access IP code on your smart phone and remote computer when this happens. It's kind of a pain, but I can live with it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome starter surveillance system, great value
Reviews.Author: Brenda M
Reviews.Content: We installed this 4 months ago.  In the meantime, we had a robbery and we were able to get a basic profile of the suspect using this system. I had support walk me through extracting the video footage and then I edited with Windows Movie Maker to produce a DVD to give to police. When installing, it took me 6 hours to get the remote smartphone viewing to work mainly due to the port forwarding and a setting on the DVR interface. Note, if you have uverse from AT&T;, you will need to turn the UPNP setting to "OFF".  If I had known this, I would have saved 4 hours of frustration. The instructions are not that good on the manual so you will have to go to zmodo.com to get more detailed information. The resolution on the cameras is not great but this is expected on such a low cost system.  After the robbery we had, I am looking to add higher resolution cameras to our system. Also beware that reaching Zmodo support takes a lot of persistence.  Either they do not have consistent support hours or are short on staff. However, once you reach them, the support is helpful and knowledgeable.

Reviews.Title: Cameras are CMOS
Reviews.Author: Rodney A. Watson "rawdawgy"
Reviews.Content: Love the DVR almost gave it 3 stars. This system is very complicated for even the experience installer. I still can't see the cameras video on the internet. The system feels like a toy, it seems so fragile. The cameras have good daylight pictures, except the Trees look purple. At night they are completely useless, as all you can see are shadows. CMOS cameras have no color adjustment, so buyer beware. Also the camera tightening thumb screw is made of plastic and cracks prior to the camera being locked in place. I will be looking for another set of cameras similar to the ones from my previous buy. Also it has 9  widows for cameras, but only 8 inputs. I have to be fair I have only had it up for less than a week.Well here it is August, change cameras out, finally think I have jumped through "set-up-hoops" to view cameras on my home computer that is attached to my home net-work??? Why make things so complicated to view pictures on my cameras with the DVR attached to my computer? I understand viewing from a remote computer but why so complicated from my computer attached to the DVR? I have to change my internet security settings to allow myself access to an item attached to my computer??? Why don't they update the phone program to work on your computer?? I still can't get image on the computer, I hope it isn't because I upgraded the cameras? On log in they won't show. I am going to hook up one of the original cameras with the bad coloring to see if they show up. More to follow.

Reviews.Title: Very good for the cost.
Reviews.Author: Brent J.
Reviews.Content: Takes a while to get the hang of it, but once you do, it is easy to work with and works well.

Reviews.Title: They work ok
Reviews.Author: Mario Oria
Reviews.Content: they worked fine the first week but then I noticed one stopped with the night vision and the company sent me a new one but now a few months after my purchase the same thing is happening I also see the colors are off.

Reviews.Title: Home Security
Reviews.Author: eligibson
Reviews.Content: Excellent Price for a simple system.  Helped my friend set up a home security system with cameras and DVR.  Went with the HD-less system because it was cheaper to put an HD I had sitting around in instead of purchasing the DVR w/ HD combo.

Reviews.Title: very good overall
Reviews.Author: Jim B "Rechargable battery user"
Reviews.Content: Adding hard drive is very easy, getting it to work over the internet is a bit more difficult. I would give tech support a 5, compared to the competition, such as Foscam which I had a would rate as the worst tech support I every seen (I had and returned their equivalent system, due to it not working and worse tech support I have ever seen). Other than setting up the internet part, every thing is straight forward and tech support was very good in setting up the internet part. Overall all I give them 4-5 stars. My only complaint are minor ones, poor manual (lack of detail mostly), cables could be longer, color even when modified per their software is shifted toward red (my green bushes look almost violet), and as with every system I have seen their range number are optimistic.

Reviews.Title: Its okay
Reviews.Author: Jmarch
Reviews.Content: Pros: price, it works, discreet styling, simple setup and useCons: awful customer support (called 3 times at odd-hours and each time was on phone for 30+ minutes and was higher than caller 12 every time, 2 emails have never been responded to. All over 2 weeks time. Called for assistance setting up smartphone viewing option.)Quirks: software interface seems a bit dated but it is efficient enough to work, supplied cameras kinda suck (quite dark around my property at night so there's almost no detail past 20' in night vision but daylight they are OK (color is a bit off even after all color settings adjusted, no 2.5" hard drive bay-need 3.5" drive or 3.5"-to-2.5" bracket if mountingIf you're looking for a cheap starter unit this is a good place to start. You have to provide your own hard drive, and I do recommend getting better cameras if you want detail in your videos, especially if your yard isn't lit up at night. I can't say I will wouldn't buy this again, but I can't say I would either, especially now knowing stuff I learned through the process.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: brandon
Reviews.Content: Easy to install HDD. Spent all day running wires through house.  Careful with wires since 1 ripped while pulling it through a 3/4 in drilled hole. Just soldered and heat shrink took care of it. Does work nice and I setup a free sub-domain so I can view the cameras from anywhere with internet access. The only thing that I would say is a con, you have to install 2 separate applications on the client computer just to view it online. One of them FileWriter.exe needs to run as an Admin as well.  But for the price, it's awesome.

Reviews.Title: NO Hard drive, but was advertised as coming with one
Reviews.Author: bigcat
Reviews.Content: No hard drive-- completely useless.  It was advertised as coming with one.  You get an empty DVR casing.  This is stupid and inconvenient.  Skip this cheap crap; I should have.  Go ahead and pay the few extra hundred bucks for one that is ready to go out of the box.  Added later--- Zmodo's customer service is almost non-existent.  The dvr takes an act of congress to format because the default admin codes on their website do not work.  No one responds to live chat, and the 800 # for tech support keeps normal office hours which are useless if you are at work during that time like I am.  The manual is buckshot with tech jargon no normal person can understand, nor are there any pics or diagrams to help. Once I finally got the system working, the user interface is simple enough, but the picture is dark and grainy at all times.  Knowing what I know now, I would have gladly paid twice as much for a plug and play, simpler to use and set up system.  Heck, I'd settle for better customer service.  I'll keep this, but only because it's finally hooked up and running, and I don't want to go through the hassle of getting another system and figuring it out. PS, if you are ordering from EZoomTek, don't do it.  They'll hassle you until you can't stand it in order to get you to remove the negative feedback you will surely leave them.

Reviews.Title: Skip it!
Reviews.Author: Freddy
Reviews.Content: Save the frustration and get a Harbor Freight DVR when on sale for $259.Pros: Decent price for 4 cameras and a monitoring system if you have no intention of recording video.Cons: 1. No Disk error if rebooted - Solution? Unplug all camera cables- Choose Restore Defaults option under Save menu and reboot with no cameras attached.When you get it to see the disk, plug cameras back in.This is with a new  Western Digital 1 TB SATA HD.Their solution to No Disk error is to call tech support so I waited briefly for them but then figured out how to fix this on my own.2. Clunky user interface using remote. You can't just turn off recording on a camera- you must go to every half hour of every day to change options.3. Comes with no bracket or shock absorber washers for hard drive.I'd skip this for a DVR that comes with hard drive installed and has a much friendlier interface.

Reviews.Title: Zmodo security monitoring system
Reviews.Author: Ash Williams
Reviews.Content: The system overall is great. The only reason I gave it four stars rather than five was because of the level of difficulty to set the monitoring software on PC. Once that hurtle was overcome the rest of the setup was a breeze. I would recommend this product to my friends and family. The remote view feature app works great on my iPhone 5 as well.

Reviews.Title: Some growing pains
Reviews.Author: Natira T.
Reviews.Content: Camera's are great, especially the night vision. However, setting up the hard drive to record was a pain in the you know what.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for the price D:
Reviews.Author: JoseCarames
Reviews.Content: I was hoping something a little bit worse, cause of the cheap price. But i find out that it was a pretty good deal :) 4 Cameras and DVR. I have to Say. The DVR Looks USED. have some Scracths (forgive my bad english) The colors are not really accuary. But it have a pretty nice Resolution Day/Night. I See everything with no problems. So i love it. oh and by the way i'm from Venezuela.

Reviews.Title: great for home safey
Reviews.Author: William J Snyder
Reviews.Content: this is great idea for inside and outside of the house for your safety and family.. when the mail came there is no hard drive mean u have to buy hard drive to install inside the box. it record automatic when the camera see someone walk and when no bodies there the record stop motion, it save your time than have u watch the whole video.. it very simple gotta love this security camera..

Reviews.Title: Very nice system
Reviews.Author: Nathan Johnson
Reviews.Content: This is a great system, I really like it. Here's my review about it.Note: I didn't purchase this on Amazon but this is the exact system that I bought so I decided to write a review about it here.This system comes with the DVR, four cameras, four 60ft power+video siamese cables, a mouse, the power supply (power brick) for DVR, and a single power supply with a 4-way splitter for all of the cameras.- - - - - - - - - - - - -Part 1: The DVRThe DVR is great. It's nice and clean looking. The user interface looks crappy but I didn't pay much for it so I don't expect a pretty UI on it. It's also not that intuitive/user-friendly but I'm pretty familiar with it now . It was much easier than I thought it would be to install the hard drive. The screws on the DVR cover weren't even on it yet (they were in a bag with the hard drive screws) which made it easier to install the hard drive since I didn't have to unscrew each screw on the hard drive first. It came with the screws for the hard drive as well as the hard drive cover. I got a 500GB "white label" hard drive for $45 on another site and it's working great.The DVR has motion detection recording which is really nice. You can set it to continuously record or to only record when it detects motion. You can also set it up to send you an email when it detects motion and attach a picture of the motion it detected.- - - - - - - -EDIT: I have now successfully set up the networking stuff. It didn't take me too long, and I followed Zmodo's tutorial but I have experience with networking so it was pretty easy. You just have to open a few ports on your router. I can view my cameras anywhere on my iPhone as well as from any computer (that has Internet Explorer - ugh, I know... but it requires ActiveX to work). I couldn't get the email notification to work though - it just wouldn't work. I would've constantly been getting emails anyway though since the motion detection recording is triggered all the time.- - - - - - - -The DVR has 8 BNC video inputs, 2 BNC outputs, 4 RCA audio inputs, 2 USB inputs (one for mouse and one for flash drive to back up files), 1 ethernet input, 1 VGA output (for monitor), and the power input.- - - - - - - - - - - - -Part 2: The CamerasThis system comes with 4 cameras but the DVR is 8 channel so I have the ability to extend it if I need to add more cameras. The cameras were a little bigger than I expected them to be, but they're not too big. A couple years ago I got a couple of Lorex cameras from Radio Shack, and they're a bit smaller than these Zmodo cameras; I was expecting the Zmodo cameras to be as small as the Lorex ones. They do have more IR lights (night vision) on them though. The Lorex cameras that I previously had have microphones built in to them but the Zmodo cameras do NOT have microphones. I'm using the Lorex camera for the front door (so I have audio) but you can buy this small microphone to attach to one or more of the Zmodo security cameras for audio: VideoSecu High Sensitive Audio Pickup Device External Amplified Tiny Spy Microphone for CCTV Security Camera with Bonus Warning Decal WD6 You'll have to purchase a cord that has the audio though too (they're available here on Amazon - 100ft video+audio+power cable for around $10).The cameras come with brackets and the mounting screws. It's kind of difficult to get it just right but I haven't had issues with the mounting brackets like others have had - they didn't break and I tightened it pretty good. Also, the camera colors are pretty accurate. I noticed some people have said that the camera colors aren't accurate but mine are pretty accurate.The night vision isn't that great, but it's better than just a black screen. You can see more than shadows but still not enough to identify someone. Lights that are outside your house make the night vision better though.- - - - - - - - - - - - -Overall, I am very happy with this system. I got a nice 8 channel DVR with 4 cameras for a great deal.PLEASE NOTE: This system does not come with a hard drive installed in the DVR, you have to buy it separately. You can still view the cameras without the hard drive but you won't be able to record anything without it.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money!
Reviews.Author: Jay L Mitchell
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, Added a 1G HD, Working on my network. Easy to access via the network. Video quality is not the greatest (especially at night) but good for the $. I just ordered 4 more cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great product unless you cant configure network..
Reviews.Author: Tra
Reviews.Content: This surveillance system is ideal for my budget. Great clear view during the day of course but at night, not so much unless the camera is pointed directly at what you want to monitor and is no further than about 10 to 15 feet. Its very hard getting it to stream online when your internet company will not allow you to port forward the network.  Im att and have a motorola modem/router. I spent at least 10 hours total trying to figure this out and plus trying to add an additional router that allows port forwarding. Useless product if stolen and no video record online to review who stole it.

Reviews.Title: zmodo 4 channel system
Reviews.Author: Pierre J Andeweg
Reviews.Content: Fantastic , I had problems following the setup on their paper , but did go to their webside and ask for their support, followed their tech support on line LIVE tutorial and I was running in 15 minutes online on the internet 5stars for their support.they now have an app for androids so you can see whats is happening on your phone. The night vision greatly depends on the IR"s this one you can see at about 18 feet in total darkness if you want to see more distance get the flood IR that amazone sells. Also the best feature I think is the overwrite feature it takes about 1.3Gb pewr channel per day .. It is well worth the money to invest in it and watch your parking lot.

Reviews.Title: Product doesn't work correctly
Reviews.Author: Cheri Rice
Reviews.Content: The DVR keeps freezing and rebooting.  I have already sent it back to company who said it was workig correctly but it is not. Very unsatisfied.  Not working yet the company said it was ok and returned the DVR. This is a very important product yet cannot get it to work.

Reviews.Title: Gread for price
Reviews.Author: scancctv
Reviews.Content: These small cameras are great, serve their purpose, night vision is 6 meters to 8 meters, with 6 mm lens with aperture angle of 75 ° to 80 °, and the colors are good, the colors are somewhat pale but you can not expect much with these increhibles prices .... I recommend to be careful with the wires that carry the canbles tests before starting the final installation, I give it 4 stars because the DVR has no buttons, if the remote control is damaged or lost, end of story Security System.: (

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: stephenson wallace
Reviews.Content: This product  works well as a third eye especially for our small business. But one of the main reason i bought it was for the remote viewing which after so many tries as the tech savvy guy i think I am, still not able to work it out to view these cameras remotely.

Reviews.Title: ZMODO 4 Ch Security DVR Surveillance System
Reviews.Author: G. R. Overturf
Reviews.Content: Talked to the installer before buying the system, he recommended this set. It is a great deal for the money!

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: brian capuano
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, all the cameras work well, really nothing wrong with this as far as an inexpensive system.

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: Maurcapy
Reviews.Content: Excelent product good quality, the shipping excelent, and the description is really like the publication, i am happy with my order and everything is excelent

Reviews.Title: Works Good but....
Reviews.Author: L. Motz "newfy"
Reviews.Content: The unit itself works good but the cameras are not good quality. I bought a Sony camera and it is crystal clear when I added it to my system. Also the night vision is not good except on the Sony cam. If you turn up the brightness to see with the night vision on the cameras that came with it, then it is way too bright during the day.

Reviews.Title: ZMODO CMOS bullet outdoor cameras with dvr
Reviews.Author: rock53
Reviews.Content: I don't really know since I am just trying to set them up to PC. I am not very tech savy and knowledge of different network paths and adaptors are required to connect DVR to PC. I use a wifi modem which is simple and provides fast service. This network set up uses RJ45, VGA and other older type cables I haven't used in a long time so, I have to buy a lot of adaptivers and a router according to there directions. I am working on it. The network paths are very specific so, they also have to be compatible with my modem. I had no idea it was going to require so much time and more expense. If you run a land line probly easy to set up. Do your homework with ZMODO before buy.  Update to review: the cameras are very good quality for the price. Have 2 acres and can view most of the whole property with 4 cameras. I just did not understand needed more components than already have with a 2500$ pc-system.

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup.
Reviews.Author: Robert D. Borum
Reviews.Content: Running wires in attic was a little hard. Once I had them mounted, I was able to view the Cameras with my IPAD so whenI was up on the ladder adjusting the field of vision it was easy.Cameras are not the best but for the money, they work fine. Some of the hardware / mounts are not real strong.I would buy again

Reviews.Title: Works pretty good
Reviews.Author: Steve DeForest
Reviews.Content: It's about what I expected.  It works ok. Not great quality on the cameras but good enough picture for home security,  I had to get a hard drive for mine, it was easy to install and get it going.  I haven't actually been through all the modes it can use yet, but I have set it up for some basic stuff.  Pretty good deal for the price.  Cameras are B&W.;

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: Skip speed
Reviews.Content: Not happy at all I still can not get it to work.I drive a tow truck 7 days a week an need the cameras to watch my auction yard I can't believe how complicated it is just to set up

Reviews.Title: Best bang for the buck.
Reviews.Author: Kier Staeheli
Reviews.Content: Great value for the money. Camera quality could be better but they do work pretty well and you can always upgrade later if needed.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Travis Elias
Reviews.Content: this was a great investment on my part atleast so far it ws pretty much plug n play didn't have any problems with set up jus a couple hours of work but it was well worth it pick this up if your looking for good product good deal will update in 6 months

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Lisa Rogers
Reviews.Content: Came when they said it would the camera are clean and it was easy to set up. Good product for the money

Reviews.Title: just get some motion-sensing floodlights and you're set
Reviews.Author: Matt Garza
Reviews.Content: I am not very handy, but I installed two of these systems (my house and my mom's) and it took about 21 hours per installation.I've had them for about seven weeks now, running almost constantly, at both homes, with no major problems.Both systems have re-adjusted their time without prompting, but I think I may have set the daylight savings setting incorrectly.A 1 terabyte hard drive will give you about 16 days of continuous recording (at higher than the highest quality recommended), in my experience.The total install price for my system was just over $335, and that's because I had to buy various tools that a handier person would already have.By the way, the camera can mount either from the bottom (default) or the top, which is nice if you want to hang it from eaves. I had to call into customer service to find this out before buying.The night vision is a joke, but I think that's on a lot of cameras. I need to get some motion-sensing floodlights to install behind the cameras.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: the old man
Reviews.Content: very nice set up--exactly as advertised-prompt service-nice wide lines-great nite vision(around 60 or65 ft) easy to put hard drive in & format,you cant go wrong with this package.

Reviews.Title: exactly what you expect for the price!
Reviews.Author: B . Johnson
Reviews.Content: Nice and easy set up! Mounting poles for the cameras are a bit cheap and 2 of mine wouldn't tighten to hold the camera up had to modify them! And one camera has slight lines running through the image after 1 week of running non stop. Doesn't really affect the image to much! But for the money you cant beat it really!

Reviews.Title: THANX ZMODO
Reviews.Author: steven parham
Reviews.Content: EZ SETUP AND PLAYBACK!!! EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED. THANX ZMODO. ALSO I GOT IT IN THREE DAYS....WAS VERY SUPRISED AND HAPPY.

Reviews.Title: Images from camera could be a little sharper
Reviews.Author: gs
Reviews.Content: I received the units in record time. Checked all components and made sure they worked. Web interface uses IE. I wish there was an add on for Firefox as I may want to view  the cameras from a Linux box one day . Might be a great idea to include it in the next firmware upgrade. Images from camera are not as clear as desired but that is a personal opinion. Will keep playing with the controls

Reviews.Title: sweet
Reviews.Author: AM
Reviews.Content: Well we are missing some items of jewelry and drawers were opened and searched. SO ....NOW we installThe closed circuit Tv cameras...........what a surprise both side neighbors already have cam security. Here's the deal.......get a system ......set it up ......use it........before someone invades your property.

Reviews.Title: Good Box
Reviews.Author: Viet Quoc Mai Le
Reviews.Content: For the price, it was what I needed.  I already had a harddrive so it was good.  Had to call support for remote viewing and the support was good too.  I'm happy.  Cams are what you get for the price, can always upgrade cam.

Reviews.Title: Setup is a breeze!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Awsome package.Everything in a box.I didn't take into account that the dvr unit didn't have a harddrive. I took a look and found I had several. The extra length Leads made it a breeze to install them almost anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Like a Dream
Reviews.Author: chickenmonkey
Reviews.Content: Owned this unit for 6 months now.  Works as it should.  I would have liked a little better of a manual but overall I am completely satisfied with it.  Have 5 cameras located around the house with a 1TB HDD installed.  Set to record 24/7 with the best quality settings, I get about 25 days worth of content.  Not my first rodeo when it comes to security camera setups but this was cake.  If you can run wires in an attic or crawl space, you can do this.  Honestly, with the addition of the 1TB HDD, and this package, I have a bit more security at my home for under $250 easy.  Isn't that worth it?Have yet to connect this to a PTZ camera as I don't see the need as of yet.Cons:  The interface could be a little more intuitive.  Also, I don't use the software that came with the unit because its crap.  It would be nice if it had an online interface like a router does.  I use IP Cam Viewer Lite for Android/iPhone/iPad.

Reviews.Title: easy set up
Reviews.Author: julie dixon
Reviews.Content: great product with easy set up.  used for playroom and out by the pool.  works great. I am able to see great with the night vision too

Reviews.Title: Security at a value price
Reviews.Author: Adrian Dinham "TechJunkie"
Reviews.Content: From a purely operational perspective this is a pretty good product. It is a camera system with an accompanying DVR and both work as advertised. I got what I paid for as security (at a reasonable price) was my main concern. Camera quality is excellent during the daytime hours but nighttime is definitely not 60 feet of visibility; more like 15 to see anything recognizable as more than a shape or movement, etc. The DVR is a little temperamental in my opinion. I recorded an image, watched it then a few hours later I tried to find the image/instance again and couldn't do so. It made me wonder if I somehow overwrote it without realizing. I also noticed once I started tinkering with it too much (too many buttons pushed on the remote) it would become unresponsive which can only be rectified by turning it off/on. Maybe I just need to spend more time learning it. As I said, I am pleased for its intended purpose (a low cost security solution to act as a deterrent). Those looking for more would probably benefit from coming in at a higher price point.

Reviews.Title: Love it so far
Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: I think this is a great set for the money. I have not attempted to remote access the cameras yet. I'll repost if I have issues with that when I get around to it.Wireless cameras would have been a better choice for me. I ended up having to run my wires over my roof and in the window (otherwise, they would have been all through the house).  Although, I'm sure many people would come up with better ideas, lol.I was aware that there is no hard drive. This isn't a problem for me. I am using the system in conjunction with an alarm system (SC-1000, also on Amazon). The alarm system will alert me when there is activity at my property and I will access the cameras to see what's up. I may purchase a hard drive so my daughter can see what kind of creatures are roaming around in my woods at night. I also have one camera aimed at the door so we can see who's there before opening.These are not HD cameras and they don't claim to be. The picture is a little grainy (especially at night), but they absolutely serve the purpose intended.I saw some bad reviews based on pic quality, etc. I can't imagine what people expect for the amount of money they're spending.Update 9/25/13:One of the cameras is dead. I will try to get in touch with Zmodo tomorrow, although I read in other reviews that it is nearly impossible.Also, I am having a hell of a time trying to get the DVR ported out so I can see the cameras from anywhere via internet. However, I can see them on all devices that are on my server.

Reviews.Title: ricraf
Reviews.Author: richard martinez
Reviews.Content: I love my z modo system,excellent price and fast delivery ,it's not hard at all to install, in my case the attic was easy to get to.the only difficult part was getting it on line for me because of my internet provider blocked my port.but I  called  the troubleshooting dept at zmodo and they remotely hooked me up to view my cameras online,Im very happy with my system.kudos to zmodos customer service. excellent!!

Reviews.Title: regular cameras
Reviews.Author: Moncho
Reviews.Content: dvr works fine but the cameras do not have very good resolution but for the price this is more than good

Reviews.Title: A christmas gift for loved ones
Reviews.Author: LPS44
Reviews.Content: Sorry so slow in leaving this but was a christmas gift for family and had to get feedback. Loved the product had to buy several Accessories for these

Reviews.Title: You can not beat this system at this price!
Reviews.Author: R. E. Bowers "Drumbanger"
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my system the picture quality is better then I expected and the DVR is easy to set up and use! This is a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Car
Reviews.Content: The cameras are decent; not the best reception at night. The iPhone app is decent, but the functions available via the website and application needs some work.

Reviews.Title: Great product, wonderful price
Reviews.Author: Kevin Saye
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup.  If you don't mind crawling through your attic, easy setup.  Quite device and low heat, which is important for my closet.Cameras are nice, with night vision.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Ann Marie Scott
Reviews.Content: it works great Easy to setup Love it.Don't be afraid to  buy it ,you will love thislove it

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: REDA ALMANSHAD
Reviews.Content: A++ high quality product that meet all of my requirement which help me to protect my home day and night

Reviews.Title: Good value, terrible manual
Reviews.Author: Danvics
Reviews.Content: The price was great. The manual was almost incomprehensible. It took some time and googling to get everything working. Luckily, there is lots of good well-translated help on the Zmodo website. The colors are weird though. I have this glitch where it will give me a false alarm every hour on the hour. Go figure.

Reviews.Title: Whats Not To Like?
Reviews.Author: alta roberts
Reviews.Content: WOW. Unit arrived early. Easy set up. User Manual easy to understand. Great pictures. Daytime pictures viewable 200 feet out. Wideangle camera covers entire 20' X 30' shop area with crisp pictures. I will buy anouther unit ASAP.

Reviews.Title: 4 camera security system ZMODO
Reviews.Author: Marshall Lott
Reviews.Content: This was my first experience with a security system and it was really easy to setup. I may need help with advanced uses but for now it is great.

Reviews.Title: Great Service and Products
Reviews.Author: Mr.P
Reviews.Content: Purchased a 4 camera system and had questions that were responded to quickly via email. The install was simple by running wires in soffit around perimeter of roof. Good quality equipment for a steal of a price. Compared prices and nobody came close comparing identical equipment.

Reviews.Title: More for your money
Reviews.Author: Jasher
Reviews.Content: this is the third set I bought, an I'm really happy, and this set up with the wide angle cameras you can easy cover a small room, or your back yard, have a good resolution and the easy setup.

Reviews.Title: ok.....
Reviews.Author: ben
Reviews.Content: First of all , those complaining about instalation are either lazy or incompetent, maybe both. Was very simple to install. The camera works well during the day , no its not hd quality but its not $1000 either. Why the low rating? The cameras are pretty much non-exsistant at night, they boast night vision.......... but they are a joke to say the least. I did read before buying and knew it didnt come with a harddrive, however if your gonna call it a dvr include the hard drive !!! If your gonna say night vision make sure it works.also it says in description it has pan tilt and zoom..... these cameras have neither, what they are referring to is the features capable on the receiver, but you will need to upgrade the cameras to get those features.make sure when running cables that you know the male from the female end and where they go, I had my wife helping and ended up with 2 the wrong direction and had to rerun them. also the connections to the camera itself need to be taped or they will corrode over time and stop working. Happy with the price and the daytime use but dissatisfied with the night features.

Reviews.Title: I am a CCTV Virgin. Looks confusing to set up ... but if I could, most anyone can
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: FORGET ANYTHING ELSE ABOUT THIS CCTV DVR!!I saw "no hdd included" but figured the amazing low price was great WITH NO IDEA HOW MUCH A HDD ...  FOR DVR USE (not the same as for computers/laptops ... few options)  and even with my bargain hunting skills, you can't get one for much less than $100 dollars.LESSON LEARNED.FOR TWO HUNDRED BUCKS ... OR A LOT LESS, YOU CAN FIND A COMPARABLE PRODUCT WITH A HDD INCLUDED AND SAVE MONEY, TIME AND HASSLE.NOTE ... FYI ... THE CAMERAS ARE ALL IR/AUTO NIGHT VISION, THUS YOU CAN NOT PLACE ANY OF THE CAMERAS INSIDE BEHIND A GLASS WINDOW FACING OUT.  AT NIGHT THE IR LIGHT EMITTED REFLECTS ON THE GLASS MAKING IT USELESS FOR NIGHT SECURITY (if cam is set up inside ... that applies to all ir night vision cams ... just fyi.If not for the lack of a hdd, I would give 4stars and recommend it. BUT I SUGGEST YOU TRY ANOTHER WITH DRIVE.

Reviews.Title: ZMODO 8CH H.264 Security DVR Video Surveillance System with 4 Day Night
Reviews.Author: your mom
Reviews.Content: So far I have only tested the unit to ensure it works as expected and it does. The cameras are small and can fit in the palm of your hand which is good if you are looking for something to be low profile. So far I have only tested the cameras while inside the house. The picture quality is good and the unit started up with no issues. I haven't hooked it up to my network yet but I will give an updated review when I do...hopefully I will be able to get around to it by next week. But right now everything works as expected with the quality as expected.Update: Ok, I got everything working! internal network, external network, and phone access. Just a few pointers. I had success using IP CAM Viewer lite port 5050 for andriod phone use. For my case my external ip will periodically change so that means every once in a while I will need to re-input my ip cam settings for external viewing or figure out a way to get a DDNS working with my modem without having to pay extra money (what can I say I'm cheap). Plus DSL settings need port 81 not 80 forwarded. Anyways, I am extremely happy with this purchase. I agree with other reviewers here about the external networking and phone view instructions are not up to par for the instruction book that comes with this system. zmodo.com is a much better source.kb.zmodo.com/article.php?id=102 for specifics on remote networking.

Reviews.Title: great unit for the price
Reviews.Author: JacksGP
Reviews.Content: The cameras were better resolution than I expected and the night vision works well.  The customer service is very good and quick responding to questions and concerns.  Lots of tech guides and web help pages.

Reviews.Title: Very good product!
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: This equipment satisfy my needs very well. So far have no complaints, very stable and cameras have a very clear image. I'm buying another kit for my sister.

Reviews.Title: ZMODO!!!! AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: Rwolverton
Reviews.Content: I have had no issues with this product, and the seller was fast efficient and very convenient! I really like this system it meets my needs now all I need to do is add a PTF cam to it since it supports it! YAY!

Reviews.Title: Hardware appears good, Software not-so-much.
Reviews.Author: E. Mott
Reviews.Content: Hardware seem up to the job, but supporting Software leaves a LOT to be desired. I haven't been able to get Support's attention yet so don't know if they could resolve any of my issues. Supporting documentation is in broken English so produces as much confusion as it dose help.

Reviews.Title: ZMODO KDS4-BARBZ4ZN 4Channel CCTV H.264 DVR
Reviews.Author: Brandon yen
Reviews.Content: This zmodo security camera is not bad for the price of $98 if you're not going with the hight end security camera this is it. It's really easy to hook up the system it takes sometime to run all the cable, just be patient ( Remember this one doesn't come with a hard drive already in the box.) if you wanted to record the evens you still have to buy a separate hard drive to put in the box and it's easy to install because it has the power cable , screw holes ready for it you just have to find the right hard drive for it. its available in the amazon store too. It cost about $65 for a 500 GB. WD AV-GP 500 GB AV Hard Drive: 3.5 Inch, SATA II, 32 MB Cache - WD5000AVDS .Which you still save money if you don't want to pay around $220 with the hd in it.The camera is not too clear at night. Its kind of dark if there is no street light to help it but they're ok with me with this prices.I can recognize the face.I installed mine and hook it up to my old flat computer monitor and place the monitor in the living room but hide the DVR in a serrate room. I had it set up for detection for recording but you can set it up to record all the time too 24/7. I left my monitor in the living room so everyone in my house could see who's coming or whats going on in my property if we were home. So far so good I like it plus I felt save even thought my place is a save area but you never know.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for the price
Reviews.Author: SluggoMagoo
Reviews.Content: I have 4 of these DVRs with WIFI routers on a dedicated network, 16 cams total around my property. For the price you can't beat them. If you are expecting high res video quality and the ability to see across the street in the night time, save your money and get something better. If you just want peace of mind and the ability to see what's going on at your place and remotely at a low price, this may be for you.

Reviews.Title: zmodo
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: for the price is worth it! Worth it worth. for the price.I'm going by it for a gift. Like this zmodo

Reviews.Title: Poor DVR
Reviews.Author: J. Canfield
Reviews.Content: This honestly was a huge waste of our money. And after purchasing this DVR system we had to purchase a completely different DVR system. The cameras themselves work good. As far as the nighttime view the cameras to have night vision installed but, work very poorly; if you are wanting to do anything in the dark past 10 feet you will most likely not see it in any detail or at all. The DVR they send with the cameras has no memory that is sold separately something they do not mention. The cost of getting a hard drive is more than what the entire bundle package costs. Knowing this now we would've bought the DVR and cameras separately. The only thing this really did successfully well was spent our money.

Reviews.Title: Exelente
Reviews.Author: brayam
Reviews.Content: Me encantaron estas camaras, el sensor de movimiento es extraordinario, trabaja perfectamente en la oscuridad, no pense que seria de tan buena calidad esta camara... Sorprendido!!!

Reviews.Title: Ghost hunting necessity.
Reviews.Author: Frank McClain
Reviews.Content: Haven't used it yet.It does so much Looks hi tech. Can't wait to ues it,smooth fast service packaged very well.
